title: why did abilitiy details get removed from the client?
body: I swear last time I clicked on a champion in my collection and looked at their abilities it showed how much damage they did each rank and what their scaling is. Now it is back to the old useless way of giving us no information apart from a description that is vague.

replies.body: The new client took a few steps back in some areas but they said its gonna be brought back up to old client standards eventually
